title: Toaru Joshidaisei no Nichijou ni Miru
original_name: 山田秀樹短編集 とある女子大生の日常にみる
sinopse:
Six short episodes about a perpetually-broke college student named Aki, her friend Mayu, and Aki's constant run-ins with her landlord.

(Source: MU)

Also includes the short stories "Godbloomer", "Odeko Complex", and "Nagisa".
